heading-increment.instruction: Increment your heading levels one level at a time. For example, if you have an H2 followed by an H4, you need to change the H4 to H3.

line-length.instruction: Break lines of code at 80 characters max. Break lines of text at 100 characters max.

single-trailing-newline.instruction: Add a single trailing newline character to the end of the file.
